author: COMSOL
description: This example simulates turbulent flow over a backstep geometry at roughly Re=48,000. A benchmark problem featuring recirculating flow, the model is solved using a k-epsilon turbulence model. The simulation results are compared to results presented in the literature.
label: turbulent_backstep.mph
name: root

title: Turbulent Flow over a Backward-Facing Step
